KeysToEntries.Doric_GraniteMaul_Started_GotBlueprint_H: These sorts of weapons are what an artisan lives for. Enjoy crafting it and then hitting your enemies with it.
KeysToEntries.Doric_GraniteMaul_Started_GotBlueprint2: Well now, that explains this great hunk o' stone, it's the head to a great ruddy weapon. Here, I think I know how to make it now.
KeysToEntries.Doric_GraniteMaul_Complete: The granite maul, now there's a weapon with heft. I wonder what other wonders the vaults are hiding?
KeysToEntries.Doric_GraniteMaul_Started_GotBlueprint_D: Oh. You appear to be a little overburdened. I've got something for you, but you should come back to me when you have space to carry it.
KeysToEntries.Objective2_DontKnowDoric: Find someone near Ashien's Watch that can translate ancient dwarvish.
KeysToEntries.Objective2_KnowDoric: Bring the blueprint to Doric in Ashien's Watch.
KeysToEntries.Objective1: Investigate the secrets hidden below Ashien's Watch.
KeysToEntries.VaultStatue_GraniteMaul_GotBlueprint: The statue has no further secrets for you.
KeysToEntries.VaultStatue_GraniteMaul_QuestStarted_Not: You find a weapon blueprint written in dwarvish. Perhaps Doric can help translate it.
KeysToEntries.VaultStatue_GraniteMaul_QuestNotStarted_: You find a weapon blueprint written in dwarvish. Perhaps someone nearby can help translate it.
KeysToEntries.VaultDoor_GraniteMaul_Locked: The door is sealed by Dragonkin magic.
KeysToEntries.Doric_GraniteMaul_Started_GotBlueprint1: Oh, what's that? You found something? Let me take a look at that blueprint for you.
KeysToEntries.Doric_GraniteMaul_NotStarted_GotBlueprin: Ah, enjoy making that. These sorts of weapons are what an artisan lives for.
KeysToEntries.Doric_GraniteMaul_Started_NoBlueprint1: How's the investigation going? I know Ashien's Watch must have something interesting to discover.
KeysToEntries.Doric_GraniteMaul_NotStarted_GotBlueprin: Hrmm, this looks like a blueprint for a very special weapon, and look, I already found a bit to get you started!
You see that place over there? Ashien's Watch they calls it. Used to be a site of some battle or other.
Oh, you've already been in the vault? Brilliant, what did you find?
KeysToEntries.Doric_GraniteMaul_NotStarted_NoBlueprint: I'm guessing you're much better at all this fighting malarky. Mind poking around? See what's sealed away?
I found a strange stone block covered in weird sigils, but then the garou ran me out of the place with threats of pointy sticks.
You see that place over there? Ashien's Watch they calls it. Used to be a site of some battle or other.
It's the sort of place where dragonkin would have hoarded their more interesting stuff. Feels like the sort of thing they'd do.
KeysToEntries.Description: Uncover the secrets of Ashien's Watch.
KeysToEntries.Doric_GraniteMauled_Generic_FirstTime_In: Oh, hello again. I'm impressed you've made it all the way out here. Really coming into your own, eh?
